sys_script_include.name: CRSDB_CatItemClear

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b399079f978121108ba1bde3f153afee
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_880077_crossplan.CRSDB_CatItemClear</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>CRSDB_CatItemClear</name><script><![CDATA[var CRSDB_CatItemClear = Class.create();
CRSDB_CatItemClear.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    type: 'CRSDB_CatItemClear'
};

CRSDB_CatItemClear.Clear = function() {
    var catalogItem = new GlideRecord('x_880077_crossplan_crsdb_catitem');
    catalogItem.addQuery('status', 'Completed');
    catalogItem.query();

    while (catalogItem.next()) {
        var catItem = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        catItem.addQuery('sys_scope', 'bdc0bd6847ba19104b6fcc88f36d43bd');
        catItem.addQuery('name', catalogItem.name);
        catItem.query();
        if (catItem.next()) {
            var gr = new GlideRecord('x_880077_crossplan_crs_jobqueue');
            gr.initialize();
            gr.state = "Ready";
            gr.body = catItem.getUniqueValue();
            gr.topic = "Delete CatItem";
            gr.retry = 0;
            gr.insert();
        }
    }
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-21 22:10:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>b399079f978121108ba1bde3f153afee</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CRSDB_CatItemClear</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CrossplaneV2" source="x_880077_crossplan">bdc0bd6847ba19104b6fcc88f36d43bd</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CrossplaneV2">bdc0bd6847ba19104b6fcc88f36d43bd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b399079f978121108ba1bde3f153afee</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-26 15:48:45</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
